## Checklist

- [ ] All content is **language-agnostic** (pseudocode only, no language-specific syntax)
- [ ] **ASCII diagrams** included where concepts benefit from visualization
- [ ] **Complexity analysis** included for data structures and algorithms
- [ ] **Cross-references** added to related topics in other sections
- [ ] Files are **300-600 lines** (split if larger)
- [ ] `markdownlint` passes with **zero errors**
- [ ] Section README updated with new entries
- [ ] Root README updated if sections were added or renamed

## Testing

- [ ] Ran `markdownlint "**/*.md" --ignore node_modules` locally
- [ ] Verified no language-specific references (`grep -ri 'python\|javascript\|java\b'`)
- [ ] Reviewed rendering in a Markdown previewer
